body:
Previously, there were two functions, `tty.get_yes_or_no` and `spack.cmd.ask_for_confirmation` that basically did the same thing. They were formatted slightly differently (one added a newline character and one didn't). I prefer the former, so I refactored things and removed `spack.cmd.ask_for_confirmation`.

@alalazo
title: More consistent yes/no prompts
